title: ICAI Confirms Income Tax Act, 2025 Applicability for May 2027 CA Exams
content:
# ICAI Confirms Income Tax Act, 2025 Applicability for May 2027 CA Exams

Ek important update hai for all CA students! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne announce kiya hai ki Income-tax Act, 2025 ab May 2027 CA examinations se applicable hoga. This is a crucial change for your exam preparations.

*   **About the Income-tax Act, 2025:** This new Act received the Hon'ble President of India's assent on August 21, 2025. It will be effective from April 1, 2026, for the tax year 2026-27.
*   **Applicability for CA Exams:** Since the tax year 2026-27 ends on March 31, 2027, the provisions of the Income-tax Act, 2025 will be examined in CA Examinations from May 2027 onwards.
*   **Affected Papers:**
    *   **Intermediate Course:** Paper 3A: Income-tax Law.
    *   **Final Course:** Paper 4: Direct Tax Laws & International Taxation.
    *   **Self-Paced Online Module Set C:** Paper 5: International Taxation (for exams conducted from May 1, 2027 onwards).
*   **What it means for students:** Jo students May 2027 aur uske baad ke attempts ke liye prepare kar rahe hain, unhe ab Income-tax Act, 2025 ke provisions ke according study karna hoga. Current tax laws (Income-tax Act, 1961 with amendments) January 2027 tak ke exams ke liye applicable rahenge.

Students are advised to take note of this update for their academic planning and preparation.
